title: Guilty
writer: Nic Pizzolatto, Gustav Möller, Emil Nygaard Albertsen
short_cast: Kiara Advani, Akansha Ranjan Kapoor, Gurfateh Pirzada, Taher Shabbir, Niki Walia, Manu Rishi Chadha, Dalip Tahil, Kunal Vijaykar
cast: Kiara Advani, Akansha Ranjan Kapoor, Gurfateh Pirzada, Taher Shabbir, Niki Walia, Manu Rishi Chadha, Dalip Tahil, Kunal Vijaykar
genre: Mysteries, Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Dramas
desc: When a college heartthrob is accused of rape by a less popular student, his girlfriend navigates various versions of the story in search of the truth.
